name: Cherry in the Wild-O2A2
description:
Cherry, a bot, was spotted in the wild by a nature documentarian.  We hope you enjoy our O2A2 Jam Submission! 

Credits:

Cherry Sprite and Animation: PumpkinRogue
Background: Mini Kle
Narrator Voice: MAHO! Cody - YouTube
Writing, Scripting, Scene Arrangement: Nai
SFX: Bicycle Horn 
Music: "Adding the Sun" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) 

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

There are 9 endings in this short O2A2 submission.

Ending Guide:

Every choice you select increases one of Cherry's tracked attributes.  Cherry has 4 tracked attributes.  Uncomfortableness, Mischievousness, Affection, and Mad(-ness)

Reaching 3 in any of these before you make your 5th choice will result in an ending for that attribute.

At the 4th choice, there is a special ending and a special variation of one of the Max attribute endings.

- Mad 2, Select "Steal Her Phone"

- Mischievousness 2, Affection 1, Select "Get in closer"

At the 5th choice, these combinations of attributes result in unique endings:

- Uncomfortable 2, Mad 3 OR Uncomfortable 3, Mad 2

- Affection 3, Mischievousness 2 OR Affection 2, Mischievousness 3

- Affection 1>= , Mischievousness <= 1

- Affection 0, any other combination of attributes.
